website_summaries.verdict: Steel toe design, heat resistance, and reliable slip-resistant outsole. Designed to keep you safe in a variety of work environments.
pros: Workman's boots with steel toe protection and water-resistant leather upper
Elastic gore on sides for easy on and off
Nonmetallic PU midsole is penetration resistant
cons: Tight in some spots, loose in others

customer_reviews.title: 11 were incredibly comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the 5.11 company boots for the last 5 years and had been looking for another option, not because I was unhappy with the 5.11, just to expand my horizons I suppose. These shoes, unlike the 5.11 were incredibly comfortable out of the box, little to no break-in required! These look great, slip on easy and stay on in varying conditions. I expect they will stay on my feet in heavy mud and snow much like the 5.11s have. The stock insole is very supportive and comfortable, the tread looks like it will wear like iron (like the 5.11s). I look forward to getting even more comfortable in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: FireMedic

customer_reviews.title: I like these boots
customer_reviews.text: Stiff at first, however they are boots. They need to be broken in unlike shoes, which is to be expected. I like these boots, and are robust and well made. Bummed to see a Taiwan tag though, Blundstone plasters Tasmania all over the box and boots... misleading.
customer_reviews.author: eric bartz

customer_reviews.title: Good station boots
customer_reviews.text: I work for a fire department and have been getting the Redbacks for years. I need a replacement for my Redbacks, but the price on those have been going up. I decided to try these out and so far so good. These seem a little more rugged. The toe cap is a nice addition and the tread is a lot more aggressive than the Redbacks. Update - After about 3 months my feet hurt so bad in these boots I had to get rid of them. Not sure if that is a comment on the boot or my feet. I think I will go back to the Redbacks. I haven't found anything else that compares to them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Warranty voided because bought through 3rd party
customer_reviews.text: Company won’t respond to email of product failure! Blundstone won’t honor warranty because they were bought the rough 3rd party amazon. No one will help replace or fix defective boots which were very expensive and now useless!!
customer_reviews.author: BettyNoseJob

customer_reviews.title: Great boots all the way around!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a firefighter in Washington DC on shift workThis is my third pair in 7 years. These boots exceed expectations, hold up to hot, cold, wet or dry. I have had to replace inserts once on each set BUT they were only taken out of use because they were scuffed, cut etc. I still have the original pair I use in the garden and hunting. 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Quick break in time.  Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Boot is very comfortable. Break in time is almost non existent. Very tight across the top of foot for the first 2 days but after that it "broke in" and feels great. I wear these boots 12-15 hrs a day and they are comfortable. I will be buying another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy, and never break-in. These boots are indestructable but man they will destroy your feet. Unless you want to walk like the Frankenstein monster, then maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Ramjet

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, although a bit wide
customer_reviews.text: The toe box pinches a little bit, but feels fine once broken in. That being said the width is greater than I expected - even if you size down. I sized down a half size, and it’s still a bit wide. I use this boot for landscaping work in desert, mountain hills - seems like it works better on flat ground rather than hills and slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Check the toe box!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about the boot except the left boot toe box is too small and pinches my toes together. The toe box is also too short and caused a blister on top of my big toe. I've tried different socks with no luck. My right boot is just fine. When I tried them on the first time it felt fine but I do a lot of walking for my job and by the time I was in pain I could not return them. I can't wear them at all which sucks because I really like the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Cox

customer_reviews.title: I read previous reviews about these because I wasted so much money on shoes that hurt my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews about these because I wasted so much money on shoes that hurt my feet on all day concrete. These are simply the best. No laces, comfortable, great on the surfaces. My feet used to hurt all the time. Now... no pain at all. I am so pleased. I will specifically look for these or this brand in the future. Absolutely worth the money.... just cannot be happier. Thank you so much for these.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Hands down by far the best, most comfortable work boot I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Hands down by far the best, most comfortable work boot I have ever owned, and believe me with over 30 years in the field, I have tried most of them. I have Plantar Fasciitis and these worked wonders to help relieve the discomfort. Exceptional durability . Lightweight . I have worn these almost every day for 28 months in an industrial environment and they are just starting to show signs of wear on the heal. The only complaint is the inside heal portion of the liner is starting to come apart. but a little super glue took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro

customer_reviews.title: Best boots on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Comfy, lighter than those 60lbs romeos yur wearin. And the look great.
customer_reviews.author: david kubala

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair!!!!! Still his favorite boots EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said these are the best boots he has ever owned. He will wear them out! Which took several years of daily use. So happy to have found them!
customer_reviews.author: wredwritinghood

customer_reviews.title: Zero break in time. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much zero break in time. Super comfortable. Yeah it’ll pinch a bit if you’re squatting at a severe angle but it’s a steel toed boot, whatcha gon do?
customer_reviews.author: Flying Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, tough, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I burn the toes on boots. Sad part is by the time the boot is perfectly broken in, my toes have holes. By the third day these felt like Nike’s. Like the easy slip on fit. A tough choice. I’m a 10.5 in Nike and a UK 9 fits nice. Good traction. I’m happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect slip on safety toe work boots
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect slip on safety toe work boots. I will never get another lace up work boot again. Quick, convenient, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tony pett

customer_reviews.title: I love this boot!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a fire department in Arizona and I use this as my daily boot. I could not be happier with it. I am on my second pair of these. The first pair lasted 3 years before tearing a hole. My entire crew has started using these as well because of how often I talk about how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable blundstones so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! I have a few pairs of blundstones and these are my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Kiyah

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble ordering the right size... had to find women’s equivalencies. Once I got my size right (6 for a women’s 9 in other boots) adored them. Haven’t had them long but so far they feel very cush, lots of arch support, and just the right weight.
customer_reviews.author: Silent_p123

customer_reviews.title: Everyday boot
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of these for 9 years and finally had to retire my everyday pair after some unfortunate paint placement. The new pair fits as expected. Its a tough and stuff boot and will require some break-in, but the new one feels about the same and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too arch of your foot.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the boots and the top arch was killing my feet. The width, length and soles were great. I tried the boots out for about 6 hours and my toes starting to get numb. The boots look awesome and seem to be made very well. I guess they just weren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Practicality,  yes for all uses!
customer_reviews.text: These boots have the best looks out of all the work boots and can double as casual boots when cleaned up. The added toe cap protection is great for if you usually damage the toes first. They fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would fit better; however, even a whole size smaller.... they didn’t. Black leather looks like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Mega beast boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super Burlie I am Super stoked on them. Monster boots! Super comfortable riding on a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Brahm Harper

customer_reviews.title: Best pair, most comfortable boot I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Best pair, most comfortable boot I've ever worn. Definitely recommend these boots. I work on ships for a living as well so these boots should get the snot beat out of them. They are lasting longer than any boot I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: Tom brown

customer_reviews.title: I have a couple pairs of blundstones. I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple pairs of blundstones. I ordered these in the nrmal size, they are a little big but I just wear a heavier sock.
customer_reviews.author: Outfitter

customer_reviews.title: looks great for work and play
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pair of boots, fits perfectly. I usually go to a store to try on and order online once I figure out my size. Great with my jeans or work pants. Fits like a glove and no laces to tie up.
customer_reviews.author: Nike guy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Blundstone boots arrived today. I ordered to replace my other well worn Blundstone steel toe boots. Quick shipping. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Blundstone Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes from Amazon's site. Very good shoes quite comfortable and they fit just like I wanted them to.These shoes are the best priced on the Internet from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: william s

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected. So far they hurt the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. So far they hurt the top of my food where there is a seam. Hopefully they stretch out and won't hurt anymore. Other than that they are very confertable
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: These blundstones look like they will be every bit as good
customer_reviews.text: for years now,I have been using Red back boots. These blundstones look like they will be every bit as good,if not better.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable, even more so then my last pair
customer_reviews.text: Was worried that I was going to be able to fill a void that was left when my Keen Portland's finally took their last step. Unfortunately the Keen's that I had no longer are available so I took a shot with these. They are extremely comfortable, even more so then my last pair, and fit my feet perfectly. I am in love with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit really good. Feet don't get real hot/cold in these.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1584

customer_reviews.title: Fire Department standard issue
customer_reviews.text: These are a great shoe they do run a little wide but I know this from previous purchases. I've had mine for 2 years they still have plenty of tread. Only thing I've had to do is replace the insole. Blundstone 990 is a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen State Interiors

customer_reviews.title: best work boots
customer_reviews.text: They rock!.... my husband is on his feet 12+ hours a day all week... he said they are the most comfortable work boots he's ever had.... ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.  If you're a big man you should get insoles
customer_reviews.text: I had to put in aftermarket insoles because the stock ones were killing my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Amazon’s fit guidance for Blundstone’s is WAY off. We’ve had to send back 3 pairs!!
customer_reviews.author: Carice Fellion Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I use these as work boots they are great boots but take awhile to break in
customer_reviews.author: Harold babb

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for my job as an aircraft mechanic
customer_reviews.text: I had been thinking about getting these boots for a year. What a mistake not to buy the sooner. They fit very well and do not need to be broken in straight out of the box. They are perfect for my job as an aircraft mechanic. Skydral is no problem. Very comfortable. A+ blundstone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this boots.im a diesel mechanic and they are perfect.just wipe them off and they good to go.very confy.
customer_reviews.author: aderso mateo

customer_reviews.title: Like the boot
customer_reviews.text: Like the boot ... no safety green patch on them like I was expecting on safety boots but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and work well if you're on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: GregS

customer_reviews.title: Bad construction
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as usual, buy this time this new model had a sewing that vies from one side to the other on the too of the toes, for the rubber protector of the tip of the boot, that sewing Line is right on top of my little toes and doesn't strech as well as the other boots
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn levesque

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots. Fit perfectly and most comfortable boot I ever worn. I am on my feet all day and these definitely help with my feet not killing me at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable pair of boots I have had
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, put them on and went to work. One of the most comfortable pair of boots I have had. No breakin period needed. Put them on and go!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda R

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot Getty happy with purchase this is my second pair
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable, durable, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Surprisingly light, very comfortable. I dropped a 35lb UPS (power supply) on my foot the other day with these boots on and ended up with a bruise on my instep...I expected a lot worse...the cap toe saved me. I have had these boots for a few years now, wear them 5 days a week and they look as good as new. I have had to swap out the insoles a few times but other than that they are BY FAR the best boots I have ever owned and I have owned 2 pair of Red Wings, Timberlands, Keen, and others.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He said his feet is in heaven. Like pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Slip On Boot
customer_reviews.text: Little stiff at first. Broke in nicely withing 2-3 days. Very light weight. Very durable, Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of boots I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I bought. Best pair of boots I ever bought. First pair still in great shape had it over a year use the second pair around the house while using the first for work.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots!! I'm in them 10 plus hours per day and they have performed better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. Might be the best pair of work boots I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a nice boot.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrow after I took out the insole they fit 👍 Fire service boot
customer_reviews.author: justin bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great boots !! comfortable and fit my foot !. Easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: magdiel quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot for Construction and All Around Wearability
customer_reviews.text: For the construction industry this is the perfect boot. It travels well when wearing as you can get it on and off quickly through security. It's look fits well into business meetings or on the job site. Best of all it's comfortable enough to wear as an everyday boot as well.
customer_reviews.author: JBWES

customer_reviews.title: Great for oaf feet
customer_reviews.text: **update: I just realized I've been wearing these almost daily for four years and they've held up great.** Great fit, the top of the ankle needs a day or two to break in. The soles squeak slightly on a high polished floor, but nowhere near as bad as my 500 series, and worth the trade off for the durability and shock absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Just as good if not better than my Austrailian "Redback" boots and cost less.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great boot just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to convert to US shoe size and find the proper fit. Great boot just didn't fit. Difficult to buy shoes\boots online. No problems with returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Brtcaptain

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Blundstones for about 20 years and they never fail to deliver. Excelent protection, ease to slip on and very comfortable on steel decks. Highly recommend those .
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Good riding boot!
customer_reviews.text: These are a pretty heavy boot. Great for riding. Walking all day is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but sizes run larger than normal.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having to return these due to the size being too large. Looks like a full size smaller will be the appropriate size. Ordered a 10 which is what I wear in all US shoes but they were way too big. Will edit review later when I get correct size.
customer_reviews.author: David Kaddatz

customer_reviews.title: A very nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Fit smaller than other models. Will have to return. A very nice boot otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany-Ann Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: Makes your feet hurt
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband in sep 2015 it's April of 2016 and the nails are coming up threw the bottom of the boots I'm very upset for what I paid for them it hasn't even been a whole year so beware
customer_reviews.author: danna kennedy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of buying this boot .loose around the ankles, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Fogler

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sensible shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a Blunny now. Bought my first pair for work as a firefighter (Super 550’s) and these will be the only business casual shoes I will ever own. They feel like sneakers but look like stylish casual dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scanzera

product_meta.title: Blundstone Work Series 990
product_meta.description: Blundstone has been making sturdy and unique boots in Tasmania, Australia, since 1870. The family-owned company has maintained the quality, integrity and authenticity of their products for over 130 years. Blundstone boots are no-nonsense, go-anywhere, do-anything legends. Their durability is phenomenal. In these days of disposability, it's reassuring to know that with proper care, it's not uncommon for your Blundstone's to last for years.
feature_bullets: The steel toe design, heat resistance, and reliable slip-resistant outsole of the Blundstone® BL990 boot will keep you safe in a variety of work environments.
American Podiatric Medical Association Seal of Acceptance.
Elastic gore on sides for easy on and off.

Nonmetallic PU midsole is penetration resistant. Shock Protection System (SPS) disperses shock at the heel strike and reduces skeletal stress on the feet, knees, and vertebrae. Extra-heavy duty rated. Xtreme comfort PU/foam removable footbed with PORON® XRD™ forepart inserts. Broad-fitting toe cap. Oil and acid-resistant outsole. Sole is resistant to organic fats and oils. Outsole is heat resistant to 580°F. Slip-resistant thermo urethane outsole is highly resistant to hydrolysis
